explanation:
code_hardening: Initialized the return variable to the provided defaultValue, added null checks for context and key, enforced the 32-character key limit early, and ensured safe fallback to defaultValue on failures.
resolve_compilation_errors: Updated the method signature to include the String defaultValue parameter and matched the reflective lookup to android.os.SystemProperties.get(String, String) using fully qualified types where needed.
exception_handling: Explicitly rethrew IllegalArgumentException while catching all other exceptions and returning the provided defaultValue so no unchecked reflection exceptions leak.
logic_customization: Switched the reflective invocation to get(String, String) and passed both key and defaultValue, changing missing-key semantics to rely on the default value.
refactoring: Changed visibility to private static, renamed the local variable from a generic name to value for clarity, and updated the Javadoc to describe default-return behavior.
misc: Updated comments/Javadoc to reflect the new signature and behavior; no new custom API calls beyond android.os.SystemProperties.get(String, String).
